# textminingR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `textminingR` is to streamline the workflow for __text mining analysis.__

## Installation

You can install the released version of textminingR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("textminingR")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mshin77/textminingR")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(textminingR)
# textminingR.app()
```
